title: "DATA TYPE-LISTS"
output: html_notebook

allows to store variety of objects
```{r}
x=c(1,2,3)
y=c(4,5,6)
z=c(7,8,9)
gender=c("female","male","female")
mydata=data.frame(x,y,z,gender)
see=list(x,y,z,gender,mydata)
see
```
```{r}
x=1:16
x=factor(x)
class(x)
mode(x)
y=c("remya","sijo")
class(y)
mode(y)
z=c("remya",35)
```
